snippet.title: CONVERGENCE: A League of Legends Story | Official Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Developed by Double Stallion Games, CONVERGENCE: A League Of Legends Story is a story-driven, single-player 2D action platformer.  Traverse the sprawling city of Zaun as Ekko with his ability to travel through space and time. He and his friends must work together to keep their city safe, but as danger looms and secrets come to light, Ekko realizes he can’t trust anyone—not even himself.

Coming May 23, 2023 to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, Xbox, GOG, Steam, and Epic Games.

Stay up to date (@RiotForge) for Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram

Learn more about: 
CONVERGENCE: A League Of Legends Story: https://convergencegame.com/ 
Double Stallion Games:  https://dblstallion.com/
Riot Forge: https://riotforgegames.com/

Ekko Bio Page: https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/champion/ekko/
